attributes.action: Close St Johns Alley leading to Pineridge Drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want this Alley way closed, due to the amount of criminal Damage that has occured, the abuse and activities of the school children, and the secret meetings that have been happening late at night. Also the gangs of youths that pass throughout the night causing the eldery in the street Alarm. we also suffer with Youngsters on Moterbikes riding through the Alley way rather than riding on the road.

There is nothing more alarming to anyone than hearing damage happening in the night not knowing if people are entering your property, no one deserves this and there are plenty of people who the damage happens too maybe next it will be you.
